9 #include "ros/ros.h"

11 #include "std_msgs/Float32.h"

13 #include "geometry_msgs/Pose.h"
14 #include "sensor_msgs/JointState.h"

18 #include <tf/transform_datatypes.h>

20 #include "math.h"

24 int main(int argc, char **argv)
25 {
26  ros::init(argc, argv, "s4_description_joint_publisher");
27  ros::NodeHandle n;
28  ros::NodeHandle pn("~");
29 
30  //publish
31  ros::Publisher joint_pub = n.advertise<sensor_msgs::JointState>("joint_states", 10);
32 
33  ros::Rate loop_rate(30);
34  while (ros::ok()){
35  sensor_msgs::JointState js0;
36  js0.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
37  js0.name.resize(32);
38  js0.position.resize(32);
39  for(int i=0;i<3;i++){
40  js0.name[10*i+0]="omni0/wheel" + std::to_string(i) + "/sus_joint";
41  js0.name[10*i+1]="omni0/wheel" + std::to_string(i)+ "/wheel_joint";
42  js0.position[10*i+0]=0;
43  js0.position[10*i+1]=0;
44  for(int j=0;j<8;j++){
45  js0.name[10*i+2+j]="omni0/wheel" + std::to_string(i) + "/barrel_" + std::to_string(j) + "_joint";
46  js0.position[10*i+2+j]=0;
47  }
48  }
49  js0.name[30]="gun0/base2_joint";
50  js0.name[31]="gun0/gun_joint";
51  js0.position[30]=0;
52  js0.position[31]=0;
53  joint_pub.publish(js0);
54 
55  ros::spinOnce();
56  loop_rate.sleep();
57  }
58  return 0;
59 }
